Authors: Emmerson Wilson, Rachael Moran, Shawn Leroux, Darroch Whitaker, Yolanda Wiersma

Affiliated manuscript: Predicting carbon storage across maritime boreal forests under combined disturbances. In prep.

Affiliations: Memorial University of Newfoundland, Parks Canada

Funding:

Estimates of total carbon stocks and where mature forest/gaps exist across Gros Morne and Terra Nova National Parks on the island of Newfoundland, Canada.

Use the top navigation bar to explore the output for Gros Morne and Terra Nova. The pages may take a moment to load.
